US, allies urge South Sudan to ensure genuine electionsThe United States, Britain and Norway on Tuesday called on South Sudan's leaders to take urgent steps to ensure genuine and peaceful elections in December. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 18:53:56 GMT LFPMFLM7WJKHPA3PHEYIJDCUXE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-allies-urge-south-sudan-ensure-genuine-elections-2024-03-19/Reuters世界
US Supreme Court lets Texas border enforcement law take effectThe U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday let a Republican-backed Texas law take effect allowing state law enforcement authorities to arrest people suspected of crossing the U.S.-Mexico border illegally, rejecting a request by President Joe Biden's administration. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 18:18:45 GMT MIC3FFRCVJLSLGZNKHOSYBBNAQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-supreme-court-wont-halt-texas-law-illegal-border-crossings-2024-03-19/John Kruzel, Andrew Chung世界美国
UNRWA chief should be able to visit operations in Gaza, US State Dept saysThe U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA) head Philippe Lazzarini and U.N. staff should be able to visit the agency's fields of operation, including in Gaza, State Department deputy spokesperson Vedant Patel told reporters on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 18:01:53 GMT S5V7NDB7XRLZJBXRQ6SVZQBERY https://www.reuters.com/world/unrwa-chief-should-be-able-visit-operations-gaza-us-state-dept-says-2024-03-19/Reuters世界
US-China advance work on curbing methane emissions, US deputy climate envoy saysCooperation between the U.S. and China on methane is advancing, the deputy U.S. special envoy on climate change said on Tuesday, saying there was an opportunity for Beijing to slash emissions from its massive coal sector at little or no cost. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 17:59:05 GMT 6L4JAJHEOZLRHMUKNK4WY4OMKE https://www.reuters.com/business/environment/us-china-advance-work-curbing-macet-emissions-us-deputy-climate-envoy-says-2024-03-19/Emma Farge可持续发展气候与能源
Spanish charity Open Arms vows more Gaza food aid, appeals to others to step upThe director of Spanish charity Proactiva Open Arms that delivered 200 tonnes of food aid to Gaza this week said he is determined to keep the deliveries going despite the significant danger to his team from the ongoing Israel-Hamas war. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 17:42:56 GMT PB6LQXL5RBK5RNZKLYPLSNV6DM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/spanish-charity-open-arms-vows-more-gaza-food-aid-appeals-others-step-up-2024-03-19/Horaci Garcia世界中东
Russians, Belarusians will not take part in Paris Games opening parade of teams-IOCRussians and Belarusians will not take part in the parade of athletes at the opening ceremony of the Paris 2024 Olympics in July, the International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on Tuesday. Canadians pay tribute to former prime minister Brian MulroneyCanadians shrugged off the cold and light snow in Ottawa on Tuesday as they lined up to pay respects to former prime minister Brian Mulroney, who died on February 29 at the age of 84. Mums ban outdoor fun as air pollution worsens in Vietnam capitalNga Trang has nearly stopped going out in the evening and forbids her kids to play outdoors after school because air pollution from burning trash gets worse in her neighbourhood in Hanoi in the late afternoon. Kate needs to be here, Prince William says on latest tripPrince William said his wife "needs to be sat here" during a visit to northern England on Tuesday, a day after the first footage emerged of his wife Kate since her surgery two months ago which showed the royal looking fit and healthy.
